scene.name: intro
scene.line: Well, to make a bourbon you'll need some water, won't you? Here's where it all comes in. The mundanity of it. Ha!
Quite an impressive chorus when they all get going like this, though.

scene.name: river
scene.line: It's an artery of the Echo River.

scene.name: loud
scene.line: Yes, it runs clean here, but forcefully. We have to use quite heavy equipment just to draw from it.

scene.name: lake-lethe
scene.line: The Echo River is fed from Lake Lethe, but you wouldn't recognize a drop of it. Lethe is cold, dark, and so very deep. And still!
Rumors of Lake Lethe's supernatural properties are, I'd say, just a bit exaggerated. But ... I wouldn't fish on it.
